page.title: 08Small Caravan Site
page.content: Mrs. Wilson-Leary is the owner of a caravan site called Duncannon on the A52 road near Butlin's.There are 29 static caravans and space for 10 tourers.One tenth of the area is used for recreation which consists of 2 slides,2 swings and 1 see-saw.There are no shops or other amusements at all,but there are toilet,washing,sink and shower facilities for the tourers and 2 older caravans.Owners and their families only,are supposed to be on the site,but as is well known,some seem to have a large number of cousins.Each static caravan has its own small garden tended by the occupiers.The grass cutting is done by Mr. Wilson-Leary about 3 times a week in wet weather.In case of fire,he has a key to all the vans.In winter none of the vans are occupied but they are inspected daily.
